values:
Caught in a wisper
in the gental sound
floating with the words
my chest starts to pound
caugt within the silents
of the pleasent words you speak
Within each givin sentance
a hidden message i do seek
I love you not for what you are
or who u tend to be
The picture in my heart of love
Its  only you i see...
and i love you for a thousand reasons
yet you love me for more...
never have i betrayed you 
like the girls u had befor
And even tho this wisper 
has stole away my voice
a kiss is mearly givin
givin to you by choice
no fear is in your eyes
no tears no lonly crys
caught in your wisper
your secretly styled love
Now i kno where angels come from
your deffenitly from above..
And dont ever hurt if you see my tears
There only crys of joy

<Big> And belive me when i say...



id never hesitate to run away
And i try so hard to break away
but dispute how hard i try 
i only come back to sit and cry
i spend the days away from you
my friends they try to see me through
stuck in a house full of hate and pain
yet sum how you find me to blame..
dont hit me again or im gone for good
Finally livin out all that i should
broken home and broken hearted
a smiles shown when we are parted
cry no tears for what you've done
its cause of u <big><big>mom<small><small>This is what ive become



-maybe im just the reason.. but im to ashamed to admit it-
*n* if i didnt have the friends i do... i would have blown my self away.. a long long time ago

<big>Im Throwing it all out on the table... mind body *n* soul... a Broken puzzle that ive delt with a thousand times... only thins time i plan to solve it... ive got 30 dayz to figure this out

Mind-Lonly...Scared, because in my mind i cant control what i feel... i cant understand it at all... and im not willing to swallow self pride to figure it out im not willing to ask for help...because then i show fear/misunderstandment/and self doubt..because im scared that once it gets good..it will never get better

Body-Scard...alone,because ive got nobody to explain it to ive got nobody to understad, pushing away is all that my mucelse in my body allow me to do.. pushing away sum of the greatest things in my life...runing.. dispite how hard i stay put..i run from all ive wanted..because im scared that once it gets good..it will never get better

Soul-Lost...Hidden,hidding from me because its the only thing on me not broken..not scard..its the only faith ive got.. and befor i find all i can to ruin it it hids, defeat what i have a little at a time.. yet im holding back because im scared that once it gets good...it will never get better


<s>Im Scared That once It gets good...it will never get better.
And here the journal i started a long time ago... but havent writtin in sence foreva..this ones for me.. so if u read itjust leaveit

ok heres somthing i found in my drawer that i wanted everyone to see!



Misundeerstood/

You hurt me and brought me to the end
all because you misunderstood me
I took what you said and tryed to make it bend
But i couldn't cause u misunderstood me
I wanted to push forward away from it all
but u held my to close because u misunderstood me
Nobody seemed to hear my call
all because they misunderstood me
When i asked them to stop they hurt me more
all because they missunderstood me
They keept at it and i tore
all because they misunderstood me
soo can you be the first to try
be the first to understand me


i remeber when i wrote that and i remeber how i felt i felt like all because people missunderstood me they never cared about me but i learned now that being misunderstood can't hurt me any more now i laugh it off.....you can't hurt me because in order to u have to understand me! soo there for i am sayin dont try to get me mad ur wasting ur time don't try any more to hurt me i only see good now in being misunderstood.



*************************************************
now for my journal entry






Heres a story



there once was a girl who could make u luv her only by smiling and she did that alot and people would look at this 5 year old and with problems on there mind she could see it and she would smile and they would loss this all they would loss ther problems and they woud see out side of that for a few mins and they realized everything was going to be ok...well this little girl grew up..a little to quickly...relying on some one for a smile to brighten up her day ....now she lost that smile the day she hit middle school and found out how harsh life could be......now this little girl is waiting for a way to end this story...but  she can't find a way..:'( that lil girl is me...i rember when i was little my friends pearants were fighting she was cryin i smiled at her and she laughed and she held me close she was 8 and i was 5 and i remeber how she held me and said that it was cause of me that she was still here and thats when i used my smile thats when i held it dear and thought it could help everyone and normallly it did...there had been soo many adults and friends perant who would say that my smile could launch a thousand ships and i new for those few years that i could i had seen it..then i hit middle school and now my smile hides inside me to scared to come out to scared that it will help the wrong people and i am not strong enought to let it out now i am normally sad..normally scared and never really happy and i can't find away to change...can anyone give me a smile that will help me?

Today was hard..and boring u never relize how screwed up people are untill they tell u ur problems so that way they can 4get there own,,,,,,the whole day i was lookin for  a reason to go out side a reason to stay in side a reason to talk a reason to type a reson to not be fake havn't found one tho i am sure i will with a little more time  but i will wait it out let things work them selfs out tryin to hard gets u no were and i am final seeeing this  after soo long.... well i have to say that peple are werid they don't under stand me tahts ok tho cause when no one cam figar u out u can never be wrong..... soo ya thats y i am happy wit who i am the only thin that bugs me is liars that say that they think u are hot or they kinda like u or that they consider u there best friend but then u have that feeliing like don't be stupd don't belive them and i have leatned that o tbe true cause thats how most poeple are well i will up date in like  4 hrs ttyl

ok i got an idea from a friend of mine to tell u how i feel through a couple of songs here they are



Just when you thought it was safe to think,
in comes mental piracy!
What I'm looking for cannot be sold to me.
I wish they all would stop trying
************************************************
I see you in line, dragging your feet
you have my sympathy.
The day you were born, you were born free.
That is your privilege.
****************************************************
Say what you will, say what you mean.
You could never offend, your dirty words come out clean.
Tomorrow, what price will I pay?
*****************************************************
It's driven me before, and it seems to have a vague, haunting mass appeal.
But lately I am beginning to find that
I should be the one behind the wheel.
****************************************************
Hit the ground 
Weighed down again 
You walked out 
But I'm sure you're my friend 
******************************************************

Alright here i go giveing this my last try if this one truns out stupid i am though lol well nothin much to say soo ttyl!
